myControl

Class RoomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • myControl.RoomManager

  • public class RoomManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class to manage room objects within the application. The init() must be called before usage of this class

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RoomManager.SortBy
      enumeration to do sorting types.

    • Method Summary

      Method to generates the room detail in the system.

      Method to initialised the arraylist.

      Method to check if the room is available.

      Method to get the list of room detail in the system base on input category.
      static void saveRooms()
      Method for serialisation.

      Method to get a room detail in the system base on roomID.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Method to initialised the arraylist. attempt to initialise array list from file. if fail create an instance of arraylist. This method must be called before the use of this static class

      • isRoomAvailable

        public static boolean isRoomAvailable(java.lang.String roomID)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to check if the room is available.
        Parameters:
        roomID - String id of the room
        Returns:
        true if room is vacant otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw Exception when room id does not exist in the system

      • updateRoomStatus

        public static void updateRoomStatus(java.lang.String roomID,
                                    Room.RoomStatus rs)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to update room in the system. make use of the enumerations declared in this class to update the status.
        Parameters:
        roomID - String id of the room
        rs - enum roomstatus in this class
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw Exception

      • getRoomDetails

        public static java.lang.String getRoomDetails(java.lang.String roomID)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to get the room detail in the system.
        Parameters:
        roomID - String id of the room
        Returns:
        String representation of the room details
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw Exception throws exception when room id is not found

      • generateRooms

        public static void generateRooms()
        Method to generates the room detail in the system. used to create instances of room and fill up the array

      • listRooms

        public static java.lang.String listRooms(RoomManager.SortBy category)
        Method to get the list of room detail in the system base on input category. Currently supports sorting by floor, room type and room status
        Parameters:
        category - enum declared in Room.SortBy
        Returns:
        list of room details sorted by category

      • searchRoom

        protected static Room searchRoom(java.lang.String roomID)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to get a room detail in the system base on roomID. This method is set to protected. only classes in the control package can call it
        Parameters:
        roomID - String id of the room
        Returns:
        room object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw Exception

      • saveRooms

        public static void saveRooms()
        Method for serialisation. write arraylist into file
